title: June Tech Talks! Virtual DOM components and continuous deployment with Jest
details:
Details
-------

It's tech talk time again!

We'd like to thank StrongLoop for sponsoring the event.

6:00pm - Doors open. Grab something to eat and network with attendees.

6:30pm - Opening announcements. News and information about the Toronto JavaScript community and upcoming events.

6:45pm - Jason Miller

Intro to Virtual DOM Components

Virtual DOM is powerful idea that is surprisingly simple under the hood. Using Preact’s techniques as a guide, we’ll walk through the whole process of building a virtual DOM renderer from scratch. Then we’ll talk about some optimizations that can be made to our renderer, and see how Preact builds on these ideas.

Jason is the author of Preact, a fast 3kb React alternative with the same ES6 API.

7:45pm - Rohan Nair

Introduction to Continuous Deployment of [Node.js](http://Node.js) using Jest  
In the past few years, Javascript testing techniques and tools have become very powerful. In this talk, we will learn how to utilize Jest to test [Node.js](http://Node.js) apps, and create a Continuous Deployment pipeline using CircleCI, Heroku and Github.

Rohan is a polyglot software developer, architect and experienced team lead. During his career he has specialized in Javascript, starting with frontend (using jQuery, Knockout, Angular, Ember, React) and moving into the backend with [Node.js.](http://Node.js.)  
Rohan is currently the Head of Engineering at Pungle Payments, a Fintech startup using React, Redux, Elixir and Docker.

8:30pm - Goodbyes, give us a hand cleaning up the space, and post-event drinks at a local pub!

Note that the schedule is subject to change and accommodates 10-15 minute breaks between sessions.
